br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization.gson

Class GsonJSONSerialization

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization.gson.GsonJSONSerialization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JSONSerialization, NoRootSerialization, Serialization, View

    @RequestScoped
public class GsonJSONSerialization
extends Object
implements JSONSerialization
    Gson implementation for JSONSerialization
    Author:
    Renan Reis, Guilherme Mangabeira
